Sentencas: In this study, the use of metal foam as a flow distributor at cathode is evaluated numerically by a comprehensive three-dimensional solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) model.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of solid oxide fuel cell with metal foam as cathode flow distributor

Sentencas: The results show that the adoption of metal foam improves the power density by 13.74% at current density of 5000 A m(-2) in comparison with conventional straight channel design.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of solid oxide fuel cell with metal foam as cathode flow distributor

Sentencas: It is found that electronic overpotential, oxygen concentration and reaction rates distribute more uniformly without the restriction of ribs.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of solid oxide fuel cell with metal foam as cathode flow distributor

Sentencas: The effects of cathode thickness on the two different flow distributors are compared.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of solid oxide fuel cell with metal foam as cathode flow distributor

Sentencas: Compared with conventional straight channel, the metal foam is found to be more suitable as a distributor for anode supported SOFC with thin cathode gas diffusion layer.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of solid oxide fuel cell with metal foam as cathode flow distributor

Sentencas: Moreover, when metal foam is applied to the fuel cell with a larger reaction area, a more uniform velocity distribution and a lower temperature distribution can be achieved.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of solid oxide fuel cell with metal foam as cathode flow distributor

Sentencas: It is also found that an appropriate permeability coefficient should offer a reasonable pressure drop, which is beneficial for the fuel cell system performance improvement.
Titulo: Three-dimensional simulation of solid oxide fuel cell with metal foam as cathode flow distributor
